thread.title: Scrapping the Dubs amendment on child refugees will leave them in the hands of traffickers. We can stop this
thread.title_full: Scrapping the Dubs amendment on child refugees will leave them in the hands of traffickers. We can stop this

author: Will Quince
title: Scrapping the Dubs amendment on child refugees will leave them in the hands of traffickers. We can stop this
text:
T he Dubs amendment was one of my biggest tests in Parliament since my election in May 2015 as before this point I had not rebelled against my party. On the morning of the vote I constructed an argument and published my position explaining why I would be supporting the Government on the issue.
Yet sitting through the debate and listening to the counter arguments, I changed my mind. Although the Government won the vote that evening, shortly afterwards, they changed their position and accepted an amended version of the Dubs amendment.
Fast forward to the past fortnight and we have seen the Government announce that they will take only 150 more children under the Dubs scheme for unaccompanied child refugees in Europe. I must say how sad and disappointed I was to hear this.
I think it is important to note that the Government has a very proud record when it comes to the response to the events in...
